definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Ay, I don't talk behind a nigga back, I say it in his face.
sentences.chinese: 誒，我不會在人背後說三道四，我會當着他的面說。

sentences.english: Don't let your conduct give any handle for gossip.
sentences.chinese: 別讓你的行爲成爲人家說三道四的話柄。

sentences.english: But we can't have Ethan running his mouth off about Amelia.
sentences.chinese: 但我們不能讓伊桑對阿米莉亞的事說三道四。

definition: to condemn in speech and in writing (idiom)/to denounce by word and pen
to gesticulate while talking (idiom)/to explain by waving one's hands/to criticize or give orders summarily
to gesticulate/to point out/to point the finger of blame
frigid irony and scorching satire (idiom); to mock and ridicule
to speak forcefully and with justice (idiom); to argue with the courage of one's convictions
to ask for trouble/to invite difficulties
to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
